channel.title: Comments on: Red Gate SQL Toolbelt Review
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Marcos Plavsczyk
item.dc:creator: Marcos Plavsczyk
item.description:
Yeah, RedGate tools are something every SQL Server developer and/or DBA would love to own.
But what about some other MS SQL Server tool vendors? Have anyone tried <a href="http://www.apexsql.com/" rel="nofollow">ApexSQL</a>, or <a href="http://www.idera.com/" rel="nofollow">Idera</a> tools? Any comments, suggestions?
item.content:encoded:
Yeah, RedGate tools are something every SQL Server developer and/or DBA would love to own.

But what about some other MS SQL Server tool vendors? Have anyone tried ApexSQL, or Idera tools? Any comments, suggestions?
